data: {"generalSituation":"A fresh to strong replenishment of the northeast monsoon will affect the coast of Guangdong during Christmas holidays. The weather will be cloudier with temperatures falling progressively over the region. It will be rather cool in the morning and cold over inland areas. The dry monsoon will bring generally fine weather to Guangdong during the weekend to early next week. The temperature difference between day and night will be relatively large over inland areas. A band of clouds is expected to cover the coast of southern China midweek next week.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251225","week":"Thursday","forecastWind":"North force 4 to 5, occasionally force 6 offshore, up to force 7 on high ground.","forecastWeather":"Becoming cool. Mainly cloudy. One or two rain patches at first.
